Diamond::

She looked down at Vamprah.  She stared, looking at the necklace.
She looked at Devilduer."I wonder, would putting her into a deep 
stasis lock possably help her? I can' do that, but I'm not sure how 
she would react to it.  See, my venom is designed to put the victim 
into a very deep stasis in one bite. It's the second bite that kills. 
So one bite might settle her down enough to were we can get that 
thing off her. What do you say?"
